attributes.jsDoc:
Make this sprite follow the target sprite.
* @param target the sprite this one should follow

parameters.name: speed
parameters.description: the rate at which this sprite should move, eg: 100

parameters.name: turnRate
parameters.description: how quickly the sprite should turn while following, eg: 3

attributes.block: projectile %img=screen_image_picker from side with vx %vx vy %vy
attributes.jsDoc:
Create a new sprite with given speed, and place it at the edge of the screen so it moves towards the middle.
The sprite auto-destroys when it leaves the screen. You can modify position after it's created.
A speed picker
